SEARCH
Package com.example.quacks_app

Class CRUD

java.lang.Object
com.example.quacks_app.CRUD
public class CRUD extends Object
The CRUD class provides static methods for interfacing with the Firestore database. It allows creating, reading, updating, and deleting models extending the RepoModel class.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static <T extends RepoModel> void create(T model, CreateCallback callback)
      Creates an instance of a data model in the database.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to be created
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the data creation

    • createOrUpdate

      public static <T extends RepoModel> void createOrUpdate(T model, UpdateCallback callback)
      Updates a data model in the database. If the model does not exist, it is created.
      Parameters:
      model - the model used to create/update the model in the database
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of creating/updating the data

    • readStatic

      public static <T extends RepoModel> void readStatic(String id, Class<T> classType, ReadCallback<T> callback)
      Reads a static instance of a data model from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the model to be read
      classType - the class type of the model
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the data reading

    • readLive

      public static <T extends RepoModel> com.google.firebase.firestore.ListenerRegistration readLive(String id, Class<T> classType, ReadCallback<T> callback)
      Reads a real-time instance of a data model from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the model to be read
      classType - the class type of the model
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the data reading
      Returns:
      a ListenerRegistration that contains a listener that listens for changes in the data

    • readAllStatic

      public static <T extends RepoModel> void readAllStatic(Class<T> classType, ReadMultipleCallback<T> callback)
      Reads all the data within a collection from the database statically.
      Parameters:
      classType - the class type of the model
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the data reading

    • readAllLive

      public static <T extends RepoModel> com.google.firebase.firestore.ListenerRegistration readAllLive(Class<T> classType, ReadMultipleCallback<T> callback)
      Reads all the data within a collection from the database in real-time.
      Parameters:
      classType - the class type of the model
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the data reading
      Returns:
      a ListenerRegistration that contains a listener that listens for changes in the data

    • readQueryStatic

      public static <T extends RepoModel> void readQueryStatic(Map<String,Object> fields, Class<T> classType, ReadMultipleCallback<T> callback)
      Reads all the data within a collection that conforms to a query statically.
      Parameters:
      fields - a mapping where the key is the field and the value is the value the field of the object searched for should be
      classType - the class type of the model
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the data reading

    • readQueryLive

      public static <T extends RepoModel> com.google.firebase.firestore.ListenerRegistration readQueryLive(Map<String,Object> fields, Class<T> classType, ReadMultipleCallback<T> callback)
      Reads all the data within a collection that conforms to a query in real-time.
      Parameters:
      fields - a mapping where the key is the field and the value is the value the field of the object searched for should be
      classType - the class type of the model
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the data reading
      Returns:
      a ListenerRegistration that contains a listener that listens for changes in the data

    • update

      public static <T extends RepoModel> void update(T model, UpdateCallback callback)
      Updates a data model in the database.
      Parameters:
      model - the model used to update the model in the database
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of updating the data

    • delete

      public static <T extends RepoModel> void delete(String id, Class<T> classType, DeleteCallback callback)
      Deletes a data model in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the model to be deleted
      classType - the class type of the model
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of deleting the data

    • storeImage

      public static void storeImage(android.graphics.Bitmap image, ReadCallback<String> callback)
      Stores an image using Firebase Cloud Storage.
      Parameters:
      image - the image to be stored
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the image storage. The success callback is passed the firestore path of the stored image

    • storeImage

      public static void storeImage(android.net.Uri uri, ReadCallback<String> callback)
      Stores an image using Firebase Cloud Storage.
      Parameters:
      uri - the uri of the image to be stored
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the image storage. The success callback is passed the firestore path of the stored image

    • downloadImage

      public static void downloadImage(String imagePath, ReadCallback<android.graphics.Bitmap> callback)
      Downloads an image from Firebase Cloud Storage.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - the image path in Firebase Cloud Storage
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the image downloading. The success callback is passed bitmap downloaded

    • removeImage

      public static void removeImage(String imagePath, DeleteCallback callback)
      Removes an image from Firebase Cloud Storage.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - the image path in Firebase Cloud Storage
      callback - the callback instance that contains the logic for success and failure of the image deletion

    • clearColection

      public static <T extends RepoModel> void clearColection(Class<T> classType, DeleteCallback callback)
      Deletes all documents in a Firestore collection corresponding to the given class type. This method retrieves all documents in the collection, deletes them one by one, and invokes the provided callback to handle success or failure.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of objects in the collection, extending RepoModel.
      Parameters:
      classType - The Class object representing the type of the collection's objects.
      callback - A DeleteCallback to handle success or failure events.
